HateSpeech_2.0.TEXT:
"As we Whites bicker amongst ourselves about this or that, Jews are passing laws throughout White nations to criminalize antisemitism."
"Gays/Lesbians are so disgusting nd degrading. I am so ashamed anytime I rememba it z allowed in America. Foolish bastards!"
"Boomers wanting their kids & grandkids to grow up in the America they did are laudable, but so many fail to see that THAT America was White."
"Infidels claim there is no gender equality in Islam - LIES Muslamic women are allowed to throw rocks At Jews... "
"@RachelCohen12 Its NOT a human right to be a mentally ill homosexual."
"Follow if you agree. We need to elect men and women to office who will lead this nation back to \"one nation under God.\""
"Race-war (the struggle between races) is happening right now. It's the permanent condition of mankind, not a hypothetical future event #WPWW"
"Israel contributes to clearing out the residents of the Middle East for a #GreaterIsrael #greaterisraelproject"
"The survival of western society depends heavily on enough individuals being racist, homophobic, bigoted and sexist"
"A lot of yall just "lesbians" because a man never took the true time and effort to treat you like a woman should be treated."
